summary:
Nice Male Followers.
These are my first Mods, i Hope you like it. Now all Males in one File!
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][size=4][i][b][color=orange]Queenieangels Male Followers[/color][/b][/i][/size][/font]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/OjZ0yy8.jpg[/img]

[font=Georgia][color=#ffd966][size=4][i][b]These are my first Mods.[/b][/i][/size][/color][/font]


[font=Georgia][size=4][i][color=beige]Locations:[/color]
[/i][/size][/font]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/SUCLmBE.jpg[/img][font=Georgia][size=4][i][color=orange]Nord-Anskaar van Askaard -Two Handed Warrior: You find Anskaar in Riften, BeeandBarb.[/color][/i][/size][/font]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/B58xLHp.jpg[/img][font=Georgia][size=4][i][color=orange]Nord-Askaan van Askaard - Sorcerer : You find Askaan in Winterhold, WinterholdCollegeHallofTheElements.[/color][/i][/size][/font]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0XX8EbW.jpg[/img][font=Georgia][size=4][i][color=orange]High Elf-Bhaal Bahrr - Mystic : You find Bhaal in Markath, TreasuryHouse.[/color][/i][/size][/font]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/s9hlAYd.jpg[/img][font=Georgia][size=4][i][color=orange]Imperial-Keevan Krull - Thief : You find Keevan in Falkreath, GrayPineGoods.[/color][/i][/size][/font]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/jJENh70.jpg[/img][font=Georgia][size=4][i][color=orange]Redguard-Raoul Rosee - Ranger : You find Raoul in Riverwood, SleepingGiantInn.[/color][/i][/size][/font]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/OtT5OAa.jpg[/img][font=Georgia][size=4][i][color=orange]Imperial-Gunnar Guhn - Nightblade : You find Gunnar in Whiterun, Dragonsreach.[/color][/i][/size][/font]


[font=Georgia][color=#f1c232][size=4][i][b]Requirements:[/b][/i][/size][/color][/font]

[font=Georgia][color=#ffd966][size=3][i]ApachiiSkyHairMale_v_1_1 -by Apachii![/i][/size][/color][/font][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28363/?]Beards by Hvergelmir[/url]

[font=Georgia][color=#f6b26b][size=3][i]
[b]YOU NEED THIS OR ELSE YOU WILL CRASH TO THE DESKTOP!!!
[/b][/i][/size][/color][/font]
[font=Georgia][size=3][i][color=orange][size=4]Does not replace anything in Game![/size]

[/color][/i][/size][/font]
[font=Georgia][color=#f9cb9c][size=3][i]
[size=4]Mods that I use for the Male Followers:[/size][/i][/size][/color][/font]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26145/?]Smooth male body normal map - Better Males Sundracon meshes by urshi[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27815/?]Fine Face Textures for Men by Urshi by urshi[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23515/?]Male Body Tattoo by Den987[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28363/?]Beards by Hvergelmir[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31665/?]Better Makeup for SKSE by Diethardt[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot[/url]


[color=#ffe599][b][font=Georgia][size=4][i]Manually Installation:[/i][/size][/font][/b][/color]

[font=Georgia][size=4][i][color=orange]Copy the ESP, Meshes and Textures-Folder[/color]
[color=orange]and paste it in your Data- Folder,[/color]
[color=orange]and confirm to overwrite if you already[/color]
[color=orange]have a Meshes and Textures Folder there.[/color][/i][/size][/font]


[font=Georgia][color=#ffe599][size=4][i][b]Special Thanks to my Friends:[/b][/i][/size][/color][/font]
[font=Georgia][size=3][i]
[/i][/size][/font][color=beige][font=Georgia][size=3][i]Startrooper55 -who helps me with Creation Kit and Nifskope and testing[/i][/size][/font]:[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2172998/?]Startrooper55[/url][/color]

[i][font=Georgia][size=3]Wast1980 - for testing and give Tips:[/size][/font][/i] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2304498/?]Wast1980[/url]

[color=orange][font=Georgia][size=3][i]Heaventhere - for testing: [/i][/size][/font][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5249147/?]Haeventhere[/url][/color]

[color=yellow][font=Georgia][size=3][i]knusperburger- for testing[/i][/size][/font]: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/6553678/?]knusperburger[/url][/color]
[img]http://smiles.kolobok.us/artists/just_cuz/JC_ThankYou.gif[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/ido61Cn.jpg[/img]
[i][font=Georgia][size=3]by knusperburger[/size][/font][/i]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/qc0f3Xu.jpg[/img]
[font=Georgia][i][size=3]by knusperburger[/size][/i][/font]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/kGVTHLw.jpg[/img]
[font=Georgia][size=3][i]by Heaventhere[/i][/size][/font]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/P4JEzvX.jpg[/img]
[font=Georgia][size=3][i]by Wast1980[/i][/size][/font]


[font=Georgia][size=4][i][b][color=orange]Credits:[/color][/b][/i][/size][/font]
[font=Georgia][size=3][i]Apachii
expired
urshi
Hvergelmir
Den987
Diethardt
Gabriel Mailhot[/i][/size][/font]


[font=Georgia][size=4][i][color=beige]Hope I did not forget anybody..[/color][/i][/size][/font]
[font=Georgia][color=#f6b26b][size=4]
It may be that they have a slight NeckSeam!!! Don´t forget, it´s my first Time that i make Mods!!!![/size][/color][/font]


[font=Georgia][size=3][i][color=beige]T[/color][color=beige]hat they look like on my Images, I recommend:[/color][/i][/size][/font]

[font=Georgia][size=4][i][color=orange]the Wilds-ENB -by LSiwora[/color][/i][/size][/font]

[font=Georgia][size=4][i][b][color=beige]Tools used:[/color][/b][/i][/size][/font]
Creations Kit
Nifskope

[font=Georgia][size=4][i][color=orange]I hope you like the Guys ![/color][/i][/size][/font]


[font=Georgia][color=#f1c232][size=4][i]My other Mods: Click on the Pictures.[/i][/size][/color][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37811/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/HH15iL8.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41887/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/GhtMySl.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43269/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/xB4x48D.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47504/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/jwt92T1.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48548/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/DciRy7Z.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48995/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/nsS0JJQ.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51572/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/b1kkTmc.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52599/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/9sFpN3q.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52641/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/MXh4jpV.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53814/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/31kSTVH.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54225/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/HEbUYvk.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54545/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/QD2mggj.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56030/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/r92O13y.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56262/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/iRePya4.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58290/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/J472omd.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60787/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/DUBoVCB.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61000/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/Y4kKiD3.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69281/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/DZ6QgFz.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69486/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/4FLr183.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69746?][img]http://i.imgur.com/isAkLFo.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73726/?][img]http:/
